code: import{createStore,combineReducers,applyMiddleware}from'redux';import thunk from'redux-thunk';import logger from'redux-logger';import{dishes}from"./dishes";import{comments}from"./comments";import{promotions}from"./promotions";import{leaders}from"./leaders";export var ConfigureStore=function ConfigureStore(){var store=createStore(combineReducers({dishes:dishes,comments:comments,promotions:promotions,leaders:leaders}),applyMiddleware(thunk,logger));return store;};
